## Available files

*   `picoboot_full_pico.uf2`: Compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico and Raspberry Pi Pico W.
*   `picoboot_full_pico2.uf2`: Compatible with Raspberry Pi Pico 2 and Raspberry Pi Pico 2 W.
